en: Bard uses their mandolin like a hammer. Hope it doesn't break...
Bard brings their mandolin down like a mallet! Careful, looks like it's falling apart...
Bard SMASHES the mandolin into pieces! I TOLD you it was going to break!
Monk focuses their ki! Their fists burn with unlocked power!!
Harpy dive bombs into the heroes head first! What a sight!
Harpy dives claws first into the heroes! That's going to leave a mark.
